data.name: ReadDebtDetail
data.value: select top(1) OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OTR_GENERATED_ID, OTY_TYPE, OTR_TYPE, DUE_DT, CREATED_TMST from CKT_DEBT_DTL where (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (CREATED_TMST <= @createdTmst) order by DUE_DT

data.name: ReadObligationPaymentSchedule
data.value: select top(1) OTY_TYPE, OBG_GENERATED_ID, OBG_CSP_NUMBER, OBG_CPA_TYPE, START_DT from CKT_OB_PYMNT_SCH where (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@obgCspNumber = OBG_CSP_NUMBER) and (@obgCpaType = OBG_CPA_TYPE) order by START_DT

data.name: ReadObligationType
data.value: select top(1) DEBT_TYP_ID, DEBT_TYP_CLASS from CKT_OB_TYPE where DEBT_TYP_ID = @debtTypId
